description: Try our easy to follow Crab Salad with Mango Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crab dishes,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Crab Salad with Mango Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 ripe mango, peeled, pitted, and diced
1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted, and sliced lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, purèe the mango, oil, lime zest, and juice in a food processor or blender. Season with salt and pepper, adding a little water if too thick.

Toss the shallot, cilantro, and mint with the salad greens in a large bowl. Add a few spoonfuls of dressing and toss again. Divide among 4 plates and top each with equal amounts of crab and avocado. Serve at once, passing the rest of the dressing on the side.
